conbody.p: The personnel operating the system should know basic knowledge about medical image and system operation, e.g. radiology examination procedures, and basic principles and features concerning images. Users must undergo strict trainings, understand the contents of this manual in detail, and observe local regulations to safely and effectively operate this system. User trainings must consist of contents related to basic technical knowledge of this system and system safety operations. The user must be familiar with the potential dangers and safety guideline principles. In addition, the user shall also read and understand the contents of the operation manual.
The user cannot operate this system if he or she has not received training about how to use this system safely and effectively.
Personnel not trained properly to operate this system may result in system damages and even misdiagnosis.
